review: Easy to install. No brainer. So far, there are a lot of options to choose from. I am very happy with the purchase so far!

review: Great deal! I'm, finally, free from cable and saving big money!

review: works  fine after unplugging and reinstalling it.

review: Love it, Have 2 TV's that don't have all the smart tv functions and this compensates for it. Plus its removable and i can take it when i travel.

review: Stick will loose signal and I have to start movie over about 3/4 of the way through the movie/movies.  Could possibly be internet provider but is definitely a constant problem.

review: It's easy to install and set up.  Great deal for the price.
